verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בְּעָזְּךָ֥ <S%H5797><s%> in thy strength יִשְׂמַח־ <S%H8055><s%> shall joy מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king וּ֝בִישׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ <S%H3444><s%> and in thy salvation מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how יָּ֥גֶיל <S%H1523><s%> shall he rejoice מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> how greatly

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H8378><s%> desire לִ֭בּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> him his heart's נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast given לּ֑וֹ וַאֲרֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H782><s%> the request שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> of his lips בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> have not מָנַ֥עְתָּ <S%H4513><s%> and hast not withholden סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תְ֭קַדְּמֶנּוּ <S%H6923><s%> For thou preventest בִּרְכ֣וֹת <S%H1293><s%> him with the blessings ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> of goodness תָּשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> thou settest לְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> on his head עֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> a crown פָּֽז׃ <S%H6337><s%> of pure gold

חַיִּ֤ים ׀ <S%H2416><s%> life שָׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> He asked מִ֭מְּךָ <S%H4480><s%> at נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> of thee [and] thou gavest לּ֑וֹ אֹ֥רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [it] him [even] length יָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> of days עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great כְּ֭בוֹדוֹ <S%H3519><s%> His glory בִּישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3444><s%> in thy salvation ה֥וֹד <S%H1935><s%> honour וְ֝הָדָר <S%H1926><s%> and majesty תְּשַׁוֶּ֥ה <S%H7737><s%> hast thou laid עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תְשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ <S%H7896><s%> For thou hast made בְרָכ֣וֹת <S%H1293><s%> him most blessed לָעַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever תְּחַדֵּ֥הוּ <S%H2302><s%> thou hast made בְ֝שִׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8057><s%> him exceeding glad אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> in פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> with thy countenance

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> For the king בֹּטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and through the mercy עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> of the most High בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> he shall not be moved

תִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> shall find out יָ֭דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> Thine hand לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> all thine enemies יְ֝מִֽינְךָ <S%H3225><s%> thy right hand תִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> shall find out שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> those that hate

תְּשִׁיתֵ֤מוֹ ׀ <S%H7896><s%> Thou shalt make כְּתַנּ֥וּר <S%H8574><s%> oven אֵשׁ֮ <S%H784><s%> them as a fiery לְעֵ֪ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time פָּ֫נֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> of thine anger יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּאַפּ֣וֹ <S%H639><s%> in his wrath יְבַלְּעֵ֑ם <S%H1104><s%> shall swallow them up וְֽתֹאכְלֵ֥ם <S%H398><s%> shall devour אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> and the fire

פִּ֭רְיָמוֹ <S%H6529><s%> Their fruit מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth תְּאַבֵּ֑ד <S%H6><s%> shalt thou destroy וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם <S%H2233><s%> and their seed מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though נָט֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> For they intended עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> evil חָֽשְׁב֥וּ <S%H2803><s%> against thee they imagined מְ֝זִמָּ֗ה <S%H4209><s%> a mischievous device בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> They will not יוּכָֽלוּ׃ <S%H3201><s%> [which] they are not able

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> for תְּשִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> Therefore shalt thou make שֶׁ֑כֶם <S%H7926><s%> them turn their back בְּ֝מֵֽיתָרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4340><s%> [thine arrows] upon thy strings תְּכוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> [when] thou shalt make ready עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> against the face

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Be thou exalted יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD בְּעֻזֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5797><s%> in thine own strength נָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> [so] will we sing וּֽ֝נְזַמְּרָה <S%H2167><s%> and praise גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1369><s%> thy power
